event ClearDelegate(address indexed delegator, bytes32 indexed id, address indexed delegate)
event SetDelegate(address indexed delegator, bytes32 indexed id, address indexed delegate)
function counter(bytes32 id) view returns (uint256 count)
function delegation(address delegator, bytes32 id) view returns (address delegate)
function delegatorAt(address delegate, bytes32 id, uint256 index) view returns (address)
function delegatorCount(address delegate, bytes32 id) view returns (uint256)
function getDelegators(address delegate, bytes32 id) view returns (address[])
function isDelegator(address delegate, bytes32 id, address delegator) view returns (bool)
